data.fullContent: Gerald is a student at a military school. He was initially placed there for poor behavior. While he resisted the school at first, he has gotten over his initial dislike and has become passionate about the military lifestyle. Now, he hopes to join the Navy when he graduates.
data.answer: 杰拉德是一所军事学校的学生。他最初是因为行为不端而被关押的。虽然一开始他很抗拒这所学校，但他已经克服了最初的厌恶，开始对军人的生活方式充满了热情。现在，他希望毕业后加入海军。
